official_title: To designate the Federal building and United States courthouse located at 46 East Ohio Street in Indianapolis, Indiana, as the "Holder-Noland Federal Building and United States Courthouse".

summary.text: Designates the Federal building and United States courthouse located at 46 East Ohio Street in Indianapolis, Indiana, as the Holder-Noland Federal Building and United States Courthouse.
